statements: DELETE FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc.'
DELETE FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE transcript_date < '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_score > 0.7;
DELETE FROM investor_sentiments WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc.';
DELETE FROM investor_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND company_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM analysts_reviews WHERE analyst_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM analysts_reviews WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe' AND analyst_sentiment < 0.5;
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND transcript_id = '11223344-5566-7788-9900';
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND sentiment_category = 'negative';
